messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. You have been told that Prem is donating 50 books and Moin is donating 10 books. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Okay, I understand. To find the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books donated, one possible approach is through the following steps:  first find out who among of Amir friends have been provided with the total of amount if each people, second narrow those people and see have prem has donated book which they will pick from any remaining list, by the way Moin has given 1 0 books, the narrow the remaining after prem's given list, till is Amir can connect. It is most likely a short numbered chain in steps. What am I to find out now from you as step by one? Here's a hint look, can any of friend in connection Amir give  you enough to get to anyone among people donating books'

You are told that Amir just got married to Vivian, who has an instant connection portal, through which you can connect with any of Mattâ€™s connections, one at a time. This means that from Vivian, you can connect with any scholar who is connected to Matt. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Got it! With this, we would first like a connective portal through Vivian so i connected to some of Amr scholar who will provide books. Then narrow done from list people they'll book they pick based and can any narrow down the other scholars we got we're gonna do some steps that you find out Now can have the steps Vivian we get list of scholars and also tell you any book we find for narrowing down the chain or can we start directly step of one or step by on how I started? What we find. And remember, any of Amir's wife, please do tell them to just so can communicate directly any scholar for getting information so directly. Thank god we've provided a communication device!
